name: Grow The Gobbler
description:
This game was made in less than 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Fly, Survive, and add to the ever growing Gobbler! For every fruit you throw into the Gobbler's head you gain a point; however, don't get caught in the way of its tail or else you may find yourself flung away.

CONTROLS

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse Click - Throw Fruit

How To Play

Run into fruits to grab them and left click to throw the fruits. For every fruit you get into the head of a Gobbler you gain a point; however, the gobbler also gains an extra tail part. Avoid running into the Gobbler's head and tails or else its GAME OVER.

Credits
